snippet: Tina Maze of Slovenia won her third race of the season by finishing first in both runs of a World Cup super-combined event Friday as American Lindsey Vonn failed to finish.
abstract: Slovenian skier Tina Maze widens her World Cup lead by finishing first in both runs of World Cup super-combined event in St Mortiz, Switzerland.
lead_paragraph: Tina Maze of Slovenia won her third race of the season by finishing first in both runs of a World Cup super-combined event Friday as American Lindsey Vonn failed to finish.

headline.main: Maze Widens Cup Lead With a Sweep; Vonn Fails to Finish
